name: AXA PPP healthcare
overview: AXA PPP Healthcare Limited offers private medical insurance for individuals and employers. The company also offers individuals, small medium enterprises, corporate, international, and dental private medical insurance services. The company also provides optical and physio insurance; cancer, heart disease, and stroke insurance; and treatment after road accidents. In addition, it offers human capital services, such as employee assistance programmes and well-being services, occupational health, sickness absence management, crisis management, people development, and stress management services. The company was founded in 1940 as PPP Healthcare Limited and changed its name to AXA PPP Healthcare Limited in 2002. AXA PPP Healthcare Limited is based in Tunbridge Wells, United Kingdom with regional sales offices in Glasgow and Winchester, United Kingdom. AXA PPP Healthcare Limited operates as a subsidiary of AXA Insurance UK PLC.
